name: gamerl
title: GameRL - AI Training Infrastructure
author: Arkavo
description: Multi-agent reinforcement learning infrastructure for Factorio. Enables AI agents to observe game state, execute actions, and train policies. SETUP: In main menu, Ctrl+Alt+Settings (Cmd+Option on Mac) → The rest → set local-rcon-socket=127.0.0.1:27015 and local-rcon-password=gamerl → then host multiplayer.
